message.content: Yes, the authors provided the full text of instructions given to participants in the appendix (Figure 3: Psychophysics experiment instructions) and described the details of the psychophysics experiment setup in the methods section.

Yes, the authors provided the full text of instructions given to participants along with relevant figures and screenshots in the appendix of the paper. Specifically, they detailed the psychophysics experiment setup, instructions, and stimuli presentation, as well as information about the participants and the protocol followed for collecting data from Amazon Mechanical Turk.

Yes, the authors include the full text of instructions given to participants in the Supplementary Information section of the paper. They also provide information about the participant recruitment process and details about the psychophysics experiments. However, they do not provide screenshots of the instructions or experiment interface.
